column1: #Text=Iroh says : " If you 're fishing for an octopus my nephew , you need a tightly woven net , or he will squeeze through the tiniest hole and escape . "
#Text=Zuko says : " I do n't need your wisdom right now , Uncle . "

#Text=I just nag you , because ... well , ever since I lost my son ...  Zuko says : " Uncle , you do n't have to say it .

column1: #Text=" Iroh says : " ... I think of you as my own .
#Text=" Iroh says : " Remember your breath of fire .
#Text=It could save your life out there .
#Text=" Iroh says : " And put your hood up .
#Text=" Hahn says : " Let me tell you Sokka , I 've courted a lot of girls , but Yue is the finest and she comes with the most perks .
#Text=" Hahn says : " I mean , Yue 's nice and everything , but the points I 'll gain with the chief are n't bad either .
#Text=" Sokka says : " Princess Yue is wasted on a self - absorbed weasel like you !
#Text=You 're just a simple rube from the Southern Tribe .
#Text=What would you know of the political complexities of our life ?
#Text=" Sokka says : " You 're just a jerk without a soul , no offense !
#Text=" Hahn says : " All right , fall in men !
#Text=Everybody listen to what I say and we 'll take out this Admiral Chō in no time !
